Bethlehem.Michael and Margaret Heller House: Michael and Margaret Heller House, also known as the Heller Homestead, is a historic home located at Lower Saucon Township, Northampton County, Pennsylvania. The house is a two-part building, renovated in 1934-1935 in the Colonial Revival style. The house has a two-story, five bay main block built about 1820, with a two-story, two bay core structure to the rear built about 1751.
